query:
SELECT 
  p.id as pix_id,
  p.txid,
  p.status as pix_status,
  c.id as customer_id,
  c.balance as current_balance,
  c.email
FROM pix_transactions p
JOIN customers c ON p.customerId = c.id
WHERE p.customerId = 480001 AND p.amount = 120
ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1
